content.rendered:
Directed by Tom Shankland.

Written by Steven Knight. Steven Knight. Ben Macintyre.

Cast  Jack O’Connell( Paddy Mayne ) . Jacob Ifan( Pat Riley ) . Sofia Boutella( Eve Mansour ) . Corin Silva( Jim Almonds ) . Tom Barnett( L Detachment Soldier ) . Will Breslin( L Detachment Soldier ) . Kit Burden( L Detachment Soldier ) . Jack Flower( L Detachment Soldier ) . Luke Heys( L Detachment Soldier ) . Olly Lloyd( L Detachment Soldier ) . Luke McCarthy( L Detachment Soldier ) . Matthew Thomas-Robinson( L Detachment Soldier ) . Ben Sambrook( L Detachment Soldier ) . Craig Watson( L Detachment Soldier ) . Theo Barklem-Biggs( Reg Seekings ) . Bobby Schofield( Dave Kershaw ) . Jacob McCarthy( Johnny Cooper ) . Stuart Campbell( Bill Fraser ) . Alfie Allen( Jock Lewes ) . Tom Glynn-Carney( Mike Sadler ) . Adrian Lukis( General Auchinleck ) . Domin/epic West( Dudley Wrangel Clarke ) . Amir El-Masry( Dr. Gamal ) . DÃ³nal Finn( Eoin McGonigal ) . Virgile Bramly( Georges BergÃ© ) . Paul Boche( Walter Essner ) . CÃ©sar Domboy( Augustin Jordan ) . Arthur Orcier( Marc HalÃ©vy ) . Jordy Lagbre( Grapes ) . Tom Hygreck( AndrÃ© Zirnheld ) . Michael Shaeffer( Lt. General Ritchie ) . Moritz Jahn( Herbert BrÃ¼ckner ) . Nicholas Nunn( Peter Mitcham ) . Miles Jupp( Major Knox ) . Jason Watkins( Winston Churchill ) . Nicholas Burns( Pilot ) . Beru Tessema( Canary Barman ) . Michael Shelford( Australian Soldier 1 ) . Nisrine Adam( Nurse Indira ) . David Alcock( Jan Smuts ) . Joe Corrigall( Australian Soldier 2 ) . Kate Cook( Stirling’s Mother ) . Jo Stone-Fewings( Captain in Mess ) . James Wilbraham( Guardsman Roberts ) . Isobel Laidler( Mirren Barford ) . Freddie Bowerman( GHQ Gate Guard ) . N.G. Rees( Wounded Man 1 ) . Patrick Marciano( Guard with Dog ) . Gabrielle Oke( GHQ Secretary ) . Andrew MacNaughton( Wounded Man 2 ) . Alex Mason( Scottish Soldier ) . Julian Mileta( Wounded Lieutenant ) . Tom Claxton( GHQ Corporal ) . Dean Coulson( GHQ 3rd Floor Guard ) . Loris Scarpa( Italian Truck Driver ) . Ian Davies( Randolph Churchill ) . Ramzan Miah( Snooker Player ) . Luca Matteo Zizzari( Dandy Italian ) . Bradley Banton( De Havilland Pilot ) . Anthony Calf( Stirling’s Father ) . Jonas Senhadji( Boxing Referee ) . Youseff Ben Hayoun( Italian Checkpoint Guard ) . Ralph Davis( Alexander Norton ) . Daniel Eghan( Egytion Waiter (uncredited) ) . Ben Simmons( Rhodesian LRDG Soldier (uncredited) ) . Michelle Schechter( Empire Club Dancer (uncredited) )

Language English.

Producers Steven Knight. Ben Macintyre. Khadija Alami. Jinane Benzaida. Lorraine Goodman. Martin Haines. Emma Kingsman-Lloyd. Tom Shankland. Stephen Smallwood. Karen Wilson.

Production Kudos Film and Television. K Films.

 

Number of Seasons 2

Number of Episodes 12

Status Finished (2022)
